name: 黃聲東
objective: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
schedule:
Weeks	Dates	Content
1	9.8, 9.9	Chapter 1 Introduction
2	9.15, 9.16	Chapter 2 Atoms, Molecules, and Ions
3	9.22, 9.23	Chapter 3 Stoichiometry
4	9.29, 9.30	Chapter 4 Types of Chemical Reactions and
Solution Chemistry
5	10.6, 10.7	Chapter 5 Gases
6	10.13              Chapter 5 Gases
10.14	          Exam I (Chapter 2-5)
7	10.20, 10.21	Chapter 6 Chemical Equilibrium
8	10.27, 10.28	Chapter 7 Acid and Base
9	11.3, 11.4	Chapter 7 Acid and Base
10	11.10, 11.11	Chapter 8 Applications of Aqueous
Equilibria
11	11.17             Chapter 8
11.8	                   Exam II (Chapter 6-8)
12	11.24, 11.25	Chapter 9 Energy, Enthalpy, and
Thermochemistry
13	12.1, 12.2	Chapter 9 Energy, Enthalpy, and
Thermochemistry
14	12.8, 12.9	Chapter 10 Spontaneity, Entropy, and Free
Energy
15	12.15, 12.16	Chapter 10 Spontaneity, Entropy, and Free
Energy
16	12.22, 12.23	Chapter 11 Electrochemistry
17	12.29, 12.30	Chapter 11 Electrochemistry
18	1.5, 1.6	          Exam III (Chapter 9 to 11)
scorePolicy: Exam I (30%); Exam II (30%); Exam III (30%); Attendance (10 %)
materials:
教    本 :Steven S. Zumdahl, Chemical Principles; Sixth Edition,
Houghton Mifflin Company
